hero.title: Sabbin Hanyoyin IT
hero.subtitle: a Zinder
hero.description: Kamfanin IT na gaba wanda ke ba da sabbin hanyoyin gina yanar gizo, tsaro, da hanyoyin sadarwa don canza kasancewar ku na dijital.

about.title: Game da GremahTech
about.subtitle: Sabuntawa ta Haɗu da Kyau
about.description: An kafa shi a Zinder, GremahTech kamfani ne na IT mai ƙarfi wanda ya sadaukar da kansa don ba da hanyoyin fasaha na duniya. Muna haɗa ƙwarewar gida da ƙa'idodin duniya don taimaka wa kasuwanci su ci gaba a zamanin dijital.
about.missionText: Don ƙarfafa kasuwanci a Niger da kuma sauran wurare da sabbin hanyoyin IT waɗanda ke haifar da ci gaba da canjin dijital.
about.visionText: Don zama babban mai ba da hanyoyin IT a Yammacin Afirka, wanda aka sani da kyau, sabuntawa, da gamsuwar abokin ciniki.

webDev.title: Gina Yanar Gizo
webDev.description: Gidajen yanar gizo na musamman da aikace-aikacen yanar gizo da aka gina da sabbin fasahohi da ƙirar da ta dace.

itSupport.title: Tallafin IT
itSupport.description: Taimako na fasaha 24/7 da kulawa don kiyaye tsarin ku yana aiki lafiya.

networking.title: Hanyoyin Sadarwa
networking.description: Saitin hanyar sadarwa ta ƙwararru, daidaitawa, da ingantawa ga kasuwanci na kowane girma.

cybersecurity.title: Tsaron Yanar Gizo
cybersecurity.description: Cikakkun hanyoyin tsaro don kare kadarorin ku na dijital da bayanan sirri.

ceo.name: Mahamadou Amadou Habou Gremah
ceo.description: Jagora mai hangen nesa tare da ƙwarewa a dabarun IT da ci gaban kasuwanci.

cto.name: Jagoran Fasaha
cto.description: Ƙwararren fasaha wanda ke jagorantar sabuntawa da kuma kula da duk ayyukan ci gaba.

developer.name: Babban Mai Gina
developer.description: Mai gina mai gogewa wanda ya ƙware a sabbin fasahohin yanar gizo da mafita.

security.name: Ƙwararren Tsaro
security.description: Ya sadaukar da kansa don kare tsarin dijital da bayanan abokan cinikinmu.
